title: Dala Moa serif or sans serif pairing
content:
Hello all!

Can anyone suggest a sans or a serif font to pair with Dala Moa?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dala%20Moa_6438.jpg)

Thanks a lot!
author: Calabaça

comments.content: [Beaufort](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042005/http:/shinntype.com/typefaces/beaufort/) is kind of eroded, but still sharp.
Thanks for your reply Nick! Beaufort looks very nice.

Some of these pairings may be of interest:  
 [http://fontsinuse.com/search/advanced?keyword0=Dala+moa&match0=all&filte...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042005/http:/fontsinuse.com/search/advanced?keyword0=Dala+moa&match0=all&filters=all "http://fontsinuse.com/search/advanced?keyword0=Dala+moa&match0=all&filters=all")
